context: Commercial real estate developer, 5,000 employees, considering vertical farming facility development

request.purpose: Develop 500,000 sq ft vertical farming facility in urban location
request.justification: Capitalize on food security trends, diversify portfolio, achieve sustainability goals

decision_process.outcome: Strong market demand identified, technology proven at scale, optimal urban site selected
15-year payback period, 12% IRR projected, government incentives available
Strong community support, environmental benefits quantified, zoning approvals secured
Approved with development partnership structure, 70/30 equity split with agricultural technology firm

business_impact.strategic_alignment: Advances sustainability agenda, creates new revenue streams, enhances brand reputation
